column3:
â€œThis strain listed on here is not accurate. I have grown this strain from a local dispensary here in California. 

QUICK REVIEW: Sativa dominant hybrid, not Indica.  Very powerful recreational psychedelic euphoric & happy high, skunky lemony/pine-sol chemical scent, frosted & covered in trichomes, not recommended for medical use.  Not recommended for beginners.

FULL REVIEW:

Characteristics: Very fast growth, very f...â€
â€œThis strain is not for those who want to get high". It's a medicinal strain
column4: high in CBD/low in THC. I suggest taking only one hit on the first go. Not because the high is super intense
column5: but because you can build up a tolerance and it's best with CBD strains to take it easy so this doesn't happen quickly
column6: to get the full benefits. The first time I tried it
column7: right in the beginning of the high I started to get an unpl...â€"

column3: â€œThe CCF in NJ has a 9% THC CBD strain of this. It helps my Crohn's disease stomach pain while not making me high. I can vaporize a few hits and go to work just fine. Better than taking Percoset's.â€

â€œI recently picked up some new meds at the dispensary and after trying SHARKSHOCK. For the first time I can definitely say it has given me the desired effect(s) I have been needing. Let me also say that that buds are super nice and has great bag appeal . After a few hits and I could tell this was a keeper. The tension behind my eyes just melted away as well as  to neck and shoulders and then.......zzzzz.   Oh boy ! Go...â€

â€œLong high, very potent.  Smoked a bowl from beautiful looking buds.  Delivered a very pleasant body high: nice tingly feeling throughout legs and a relaxing but not overpowering heaviness.  High is producing very lucid thoughts.  I recommend laying on your comfiest piece of furniture and simply listening to your favorite album start to finish.  Music sounds phenomenal.â€

â€œIf everyone smoked shark shock, opiate / heroin/addiction would be thing of the past!  Union electrician by trade.  I haven't found a straind that Molly whops any kind of pain! Standing on a ladder for hours and constantly working over head, I suffer major shoulder/trap/ neck ailments.    1 bat blast or splif, pain evaporates! Even with the heavy body waves and tingling sensations, very level headed!  I am a very hyp...â€

â€œI have the CBD strain Shark Shock and I must say... I have been battling PTSD and Anxiety for a very long time and I recently started smoking Medical MJ and this strain has woke me up out of a living nightmare.
its 9% CBD and 7% THC and I now smoke this every morning to relax and get me in the mood of actually living. My anxiety has shot way down and my rapid uncomfortable thoughts and memories have faded away to the...â€
â€œI'm trying so hard to remember what I wanted to type..â€

â€œMethod Ingested: Dab 
THC: 27.85      CBD: 49.12 
 
              Top 3 Turpene Profiles:
1) Bisabolol (6.9%)   Found in Chamomile. Anti-Bacterial.   Anti-Flammatory. Fights Bacteria
2) Pinene (0.82%) Found in Sage & Pine Needles. Promotes focus and memory retention. Effective for pain, anxiety and stress reliever.
3) Nerolilol (0.33%) Found in ginger and citronella. Woody fresh bark aroma. Has sedative properties, g...â€

â€œShark Shock has become one of my new favorite strains. It is a wonderful daytime smoke that helps with my chronic pain but doesn't give me couch lock. It has a very nice and mellow high. It does make me hungry but not hella hungry like other strains. It helps with pain but not as good as other strains but it does come close. After smoking I don't have to take my pain meds as often & it helps to relax me which helps m...â€
â€œAfter 7 years of growing different strains from seed, I've finally found my Calming weed". Ahh
column4: let the stress of the day just melt away and relax your mind. It takes care of anxiety on contact while leaving you with just the right amount of cognitive capabilities. I just realized I smoked some before this review. I wonder if everybody else that writes these reviews are stoned out of their mind when they write? Well...â€"

column3: â€œThe shark shock from High Level Health has 20% THC along with 17% CBD making it a very fun high.  This strain addresses any complaints you might have as far as muscle tightness and spasms along with pain management.  Unlike other CBD strains this strain has a high THC count providing the best of both worlds in one indica dominant puff.  Reccomended for anyone using cannabis for medical purposes, or those looking for ...â€

â€œI inhaled this lovely strain with the aid of my Volcano Vaporizer.  Tastes great and smells awesome, gave me a little bit of the pasties but nothing I'm not used to and a cold beer can't handle.  I've added a high resolution image of the Shark Shock I had.â€

â€œI have extreme anxiety and depression to go along with it. This strain relieves both symptoms in no time. I feel at ease and normal after spending some time with the Shark Shock. Highly recommended for the anxious mind.â€
â€œI use it to help my seizures and its been an amazing help. I can finally get some relief and relax. I love it.â€

â€œI have not smoked pot in 15+ years.  I recently injured my knee and had some high CBD homegrown strain.  After enjoying that, I decided to start exploring to see what else I might like and how it might help improve other areas of my life, such as sleep and mood.  I bought this strain as a preroll, took 2 hits and felt an instant super mild euphoria and happiness.  It had a clean energy, I was focused and getting thin...â€

â€œI see some debate that claims one or another strain is or is not shark shock. I obtained some from Temescal Wellness in NH, as it was a suggested strain for my back pain and anxiety due to it's high CBD content.

Appearance: nice compact, crystally buds with short hairs. Scent is more pine and earth, less skunk and lemon up front. Breaks down real nice into perfect consistency for tight packs and high surface area.

...â€

â€œI have had shark shock in both flower and BHO recently and it has become my favorite strain. It does not have an amazing smell or taste, but the high is perfect for me and has excellent medical benefits. The BHO I had was 49.9% CBD and a THC contect of only 7%. The shark Shock really mellows me out, and I can puff tough w/ out ever having anxiety or paranoia. This is due to the CBD/THC properties obviously, but if yo...â€

â€œMost excellent at making pain more bearable!

This strain tastes ok, but the high is where it's at. It is high CBD, and therefor very relaxing. Mine measures consistently in the 12% - 14% range. This CBD makes you feel comfortable. It is calming and relaxing. That's the best feature of this good enough tasting weed, so be sure to take one hit of a Sativa strain. JUST ONE! This will make you more creative along with t...â€
â€œIf you manage to get your hands on this strain, then stock up. This is some of the best and stickiest weed that I've seen. Very happy and stress relieving high. By far the best strain I've had.â€

â€œShark Shock is my go-to anti-inflammatory pain and pain reliever. As someone who suffers from chronic bouts of optic neuritis, this is the one strain I can use where, with a little coffee to keep me from being too drowsy, I can function and go about my daily tasks without issue. Very relaxing with minimal psychedelic effects. 

#420Sweepstakesâ€
â€œExcellent strain from Ermont, one of their best.  Euphoric pain relief, very nice and potent, solid indica qualities, stoney and long lasting,  long frosty green and orange buds, very nice.â€

â€œCultivar- Curio Wellness
Dispensary- RISE Bethesda
Great mix of THC and CBD. Gets you high and provides pain relief; mental and physical healing! Tastes very good as well. 5/5â€

â€œMan this strain makes me feel like im sleeping with the fishes! Every dab i take is a shock to the system that makes me feel the pressure of being twenty thousand underneath the sea. Too me it only taste earthy but its still a nice taste and the high is a heavy indica but a great strain overall.â€
â€œBest pain reliever so farâ€

â€œThis is one of the first strains I tried after a 13 year break from weed. I chose this strain for the cbd indica affects for stress and pain. Shark shock is good anytime of the day very mellow 8% thc 9%cbd. Very mellow good mood functional high. Plan to grow this strain liked it so much I purchased seedsâ€

â€œVision becomes glowy and turns everything a bit soft, like your visionâ€™s slightly out of focus. Similar to that old film technique to soften women. Pleasurable, smile-inducing cheer thatâ€™s somewhat too tempered by a streak of paranoia. The good is plentiful enough to mostly distract from it. Weighty on the head which lends to an extremely drifty headspace. Body is surprisingly normal and capable while head is floatin...â€

â€œOne of my fave - your body pain goes or at least, is very easy to distract from and to be physically active on this (hiking, lawn maintenance, house cleaning) -your body just goes!  No shortage of strength or fatigue really.  Pretty thick head high but totally functional.  Everything is in slow mo and sensual and you wonder why the hell not everyone is smoking this!  I feel like my conversation skills slow down, but ...â€
â€œVery relaxing enjoyable strain.â€

â€œI like the mild cerebral effect of this strain, but I LOVE how it relaxes me and my back and knee pain disappears. This is my favorite to smoke when I am engaged in an activity like crafting or talking.â€
â€œThe absolute best strain I have used for appetite control. Finding hunger is a big issue for me, and this is time and again the best.â€

â€œYou've read the description. This strain is perfect for those who hunt sharks during the day or night. These sharks may be depression, stress, panick attacks, and whatever it may be that keeps you underwater from feeling relaxed ready. This Great White devours all of them, making you feel a feeling you havent for awhile. Dont tell your friends if they feel stressed coz you're not. Hell, feeling relaxed at work is ill...â€

â€œI like the mild cerebral effect of this strain, but I LOVE how it relaxes me and my back and knee pain disappears. This is my favorite to smoke when I am engaged in an activity like crafting or talking.â€
â€œThe absolute best strain I have used for appetite control. Finding hunger is a big issue for me, and this is time and again the best.â€

â€œYou've read the description. This strain is perfect for those who hunt sharks during the day or night. These sharks may be depression, stress, panick attacks, and whatever it may be that keeps you underwater from feeling relaxed ready. This Great White devours all of them, making you feel a feeling you havent for awhile. Dont tell your friends if they feel stressed coz you're not. Hell, feeling relaxed at work is ill...â€
â€œExcellent, very relaxing with that amp up you're looking for, not too pungent of an order. Definite good high.â€
â€œStraight Fire!! Definitely a runner up for my favorite strain!! I had to look it up to see the effects cause I was sooo high!!â€

â€œMy favorite higher CBD strain so far.  The flower I picked up was %17 Cbd and %1 THC. It helps mellow out the THC effects in my higher THC strains. I get much better pain relief with this mixed with the higher THC strains. My favorite so far is 50/50 mix of this and Ace of Spades. This is also the best strain I have found to relieve inflammation. Well worth a try if you are looking for a higher Cbd strain.â€

â€œI adore the high I get from Shark Shock. It's so relaxing and is an easy-going experience in social settings. In small doses, I can still remain productive, but I would say it is best used in the evenings. The only downside, in my opinion, is massive munchies. But of course, this will be highly beneficial to those suffering from appetite loss.â€

â€œI bought some from a strainwise dispensary, it looked and smelled grown correctly. I'm a light eight with low tolerance, I suffer from severe anxiety and social anxiety(social phobia), and I smoke to try and relive that. 
The CBD:THC RATIO was 8%CBD:4%THC. Even still the beginning high was too high and too intense for me after 20-30min when the high leveled out or bottomed out I was a very good and relaxing feeling. ...â€

â€œI picked some up to help me fight pain. I'm always looking for the strains that give good pain relief. I toke a puff or two and got a nice cerebral high nothing too intense just nice, but what this strain did do was turn down the pain I deal with. I have stenosis in my neck and have several tears in my right shoulder rotator cuff and some epic bone spurs. I'm feeling no pain, nice. I feel happy.  This strain does not...â€

â€œManaged to pick up the last 1/8th at a local dispensary for about 13$. Wasnâ€™t expecting much due to its low THC%, but it really did do the job. Had a nice night of cuddling with my girlfriend. Fell asleep and woke up fully rested. Definitely recommend for beginners (like me).â€

â€œIt's definitely going to put you to sleep, but only if you can ignore the itching.  For some reason it gives my legs crazy itchiness, and I've been smoking it for about a month now.  If you have moisturizer nearby, you'll be fine.  The mental high is great, perfect clarity and very easy to socialize.  The muscle relaxation is awesome if you just take a deep breath and sink into your couch/chair/bed.  Looking forward ...â€

â€œI got this strain in the form of a CO cartridge. Being highly sensitive to THC, its been a difficult road to find strains that work with me and not against me. This strain was uplifting and not too sedating like most indicas seem to be for me. loved it!â€

â€œUnfortunately, due to Canada's legalizing cannabis. Trying to get CBD on my medicinal site was next to nothing. so I went on to my rec site and found this gem.

I was Mellow, stopped anxiety attacks, I was able to clean my house, listen to music. EAT!

sounds like a normal day for others, but I have PTSD, Anxiety and depression.

I have spent years on antidepressants, and was so much better in quality of life. Best t...â€

â€œI'm making my way around the high CBD strains in my efforts to manage pain/anxiety while sharpening my impression of a mostly-functioning grownup. I like this as my it's quittin' time" version of ACDC.

column2: so I can see it not appealing to some folks. But
column3: for me it has just enough uplift/focus to be social/engaged
column4: while still having floaty indica quality that let's your brain know you'r...â€"

column3:
â€œPicked up a pre rolled cone, i dont burn a whole doob, so i just rip off a piece  and smoke a bowl. This strain is chill. very little head or body effects, high cbd so it has some helping effects. calming effects. chillin eating a deep dish pizza pie.homemade. got d munchies. 
check n it out in East Mesa.â€
â€œFragrant and tasty. Heavy mellow high at first with a hint of anxiety that settled and dissipated fairly quickly. Overall, a very nice smooth, warm, and mellow high.â€
â€œpretty nice, uplifting strain. I get a bit sleepy right afterwards but still enjoy the high.â€

â€œPicked up a pre rolled cone, i dont burn a whole doob, so i just rip off a piece  and smoke a bowl. This strain is chill. very little head or body effects, high cbd so it has some helping effects. calming effects. chillin eating a deep dish pizza pie.homemade. got d munchies.

â€œIâ€™m usually a Sativa hybrid user, But I love this Indica!  Very intense body high and strong long lasting head fuzz. I feel total relief from the days panic and anxiety.  I am very happy that it doesnâ€™t make me sleepy either... I hate thatâ€

â€œI originally wanted Mr. Nice Guy, but they were out and recommended this instead. Buds were big and beautiful with lots of frost and hairs. Really lushious consistency. The smell was awesome. Very blueberry and earthy and yummy! The smoke was thick and smooth, the taste somewhat mimicked the smell. The high was quick to hit and heavy on both the body and mind. I definitely got very stoned very quick. Not a great stra...â€

â€œThe strain I had was very high CBD, not sure if that is typical, was also exceedingly 'fresh' and sticky. I smoked about 1/4 a gram..and boy, it hit like a freight train. I was on vacation, and looking for something strong and relaxing; and just happened along the perfect strain at the perfect time. Hallucinogenic, happy, and intensely relaxing.â€

â€œJust picked this strain up from a local shop here in ashland Oregon ( House Of Leaves ) Never tried a cbd before. I packed a small bowl and only had two hits. Waited ten minutes to see exactly how the strain affects me and , as of now i feel very relaxed to the tee! No pain in my body what so ever!! I dont feel so high but i do feel kind of high like on a scale from 1-10 i'd say im at a 2. But i do feel like if i lai...â€
â€œGreat for medical. But for an overall high, it's not that great. Great for pain and insomnia though!â€
â€œVery nice strain really good after a long days work very bulky dense budz  real nice skunky earth smell very smooth and  clean would recommendâ€

â€œI'm down with the shark.  This will give you a nice mid level head rush and a nice mid-level body rush. All together it'll Mellow you you and down. Good for those lazy days when you wanna calm couch lock and to have the munchies. It's worth picking up a couple grams. Nice novice smoke right here.â€
â€œGreat for medical. But for an overall high, it's not that great. Great for pain and insomnia though!â€
â€œI love it for the balanced it gives me, got rid of pain pretty well. would recommendâ€

â€œI was pretty impressed with this super-high CBD strain. Because I was in a social situation that frowned upon outright herbal inebriation, and because my shoulder was giving me a lot of trouble, I elected to go with the Shock. Nice flavor and smell. Not harsh at all. Forgot about the shoulder a couple hits in, and managed to watch a movie all the way through without bouncing up and down. NICE strain for time-to-relax...â€

â€œ50/50 on this one perfect night time strain first time I used this was a hard hitter felt a little anxious but the taste smell and affects for pain are great I recomend trying this at home first and seeing how it works for you first time smokers start slow it can sneak up on youâ€

â€œPicked up an eighth from lifted health and wellness SF. Good quality strain with sweet earthy undertones. Very enjoyable smoke, I found myself locked on the couch watching Netflix for about an Hr. When I smoke this strain I feel happy relaxed and hungry. Overall good high!!â€
â€œThis strain really helps with my depression, anxiety, stress and many more. I really like how it relaxes me and takes away all my pain.â€
â€œ1 of my all time favorites. Very Tasty. This strain used to be called Great White Shark and the Peacemaker. It originated in the mid 90's. Its parents were White Widow and Skunk #1.â€

â€œThis is a nice strain for pain relief. Mild high with only 6.43% THC and 10.3% CBD. This batch I got from Redecan is earthy with a hint of hops. Very relaxing, mellow with a light body buzz. Beautiful to smoke, vape or make oil with. I enjoy this on its own or mixed with a higher THC strain to get a little more of the cerebral high to compliment my body high. I hope everyone enjoys this as much as I do.â€
â€œLove to have this in the daytime for my back pain and some energy keeping me awake but at night, I will plead the 5th! To the couch it is and sleep is undisturbed.â€
â€œI use it to help sleep. still waiting for Charlotte's Web in our area. Shark Shock is a great  strain.â€

â€œI got this in Portland, Oregon as a pre-roll, it was free with a purchase of an 1/8th of Purple Candy (one of my favorite strains). Of course I canâ€™t find it in eastern Washington where I live lol! Weâ€™re lucky to have a fine selection, just not these two.
This was a high CBD 16% to THC 4.6% ratio and I have to tell you, it actually had THC feels to it, but absolutely no paranoia, and thatâ€™s coming from someone who ge...â€

â€œ50/50 on this one perfect night time strain first time I used this was a hard hitter felt a little anxious but the taste smell and affects for pain are great I recomend trying this at home first and seeing how it works for you first time smokers start slow it can sneak up on youâ€
â€œGreat evening strain. Very relaxing body high with little euphoric effects. Great when mixed with other strainsâ€
â€œHeavy body high. Definitely lived up to the description. Felt light  and way sleepier than usualâ€

â€œIt wasn't my favorite, but it's defiantly better than a lot I've tried. For me it was a very mellow head high, but had a very nice full body high. It took away my pain and helped with my PTSD which was what I was going for, but it also made me eat half my kitchen, and then promptly pass out, lol!â€

â€œnice balance of CBD relaxation and that heavy feeling behind your eyes. smoked a vaporizer bowl (about a half gram) and felt body relaxation, anxiety decreased, nausea decreased, and an overall feeling of peace came over my whole being.â€
â€œa gentle coming of the mind and a gentle common of the body. A nice compromiseâ€

â€œI received this strain from my local cannabis delivery service, Lifted420 Health and Wellness in San Francisco. Very nice looking buds with a distinct W Widow aroma. Shark Shock has some W Widow in it's parentage , so we can see how the Widow bud aroma comes out in Shark Shock. Potency is outstanding and will ease your aches and pains in a very effective and safe manner. A day of stress at work or any situations whic...â€

â€œAbsolutely love this strain. When I smelled it I just love the fruity, blueberry aroma I got! It has a great smell to it! It's actually a hybrid. And I am lucky because I got the sativa effect from it. 

Wish Leafly would change the info for this strain.

I know it's not high on CBD scale but It's good for people like me who need an almost 50/50 THC/CBD strain to ease their pain. CBD alone doesn't work for me.

Highl...â€

â€œThe Shark Shock I got was exactly what the reviewer CaliforniaMedical wrote about.  It was a sativa not indica dominant hybrid.  It was nothing special to look at, nor was the faint lemon/pine taste all that great.  What makes Shark Shock so good is the intense psychedelic effects!  I've never gotten a feeling from weed like that before.  The stairs to my apartment started to change shape right when I was peaking and...â€

The downside is the high wasn't potent enough for me because an hour or so into my high it was already declining. I was clambering to get another session in to keep my high going. Good flavor on the flower but bad after taste.â€

â€œDecent body effect but sorely lacking in the flavor department. The nugs I got were small and compact, with great smell but seriously lacking in taste. A good morning wake up smoke. Lists of energy without restlessness, but a little low on the scale for pain relief.â€

â€œhigh CBD, good for insomniaâ€
â€œCombined this with Mendo Puff and some Martian Mean Green. Exhaled through my nose, and felt like I was camping in the mountains.â€

â€œThe color and smell had this standing out for sure, and with all the discounts I paid $2 for a gram! Anyway this strain is quite powerful, with a high you can definitely feel quite quickly which is amazing! After two hits I added a little Cookies and Cream and WOW it's an outstanding mixtureâ€
â€œSuper mellow strain. Good for daytime when you have to function. Caution, it may make you very hungry, which normally doesn't happen to me.â€
â€œFeeling very relaxed but not lethargic with this strain. Definitely a great day time indica to accompany a trip to the record shop or your favorite coffee joint!â€
â€œnot very strong head high . but very nice body high.â€
â€œGreat strain. High in CBD and produces a very relaxing high.â€
â€œHelps somewhat with spasmsâ€
â€œVerry relaxing, could be useful  if you are haveing trouble sleeping, or if you are haveing a bad day.â€
â€œSmooth on the lungs, and sweet. very cerebral, but great for aches. Amazing stuff!â€
â€œFor my medical symptoms this indica is average.  I didn't get the relief I normally get.  It did make me super hungry and the flower looks awesome.â€
â€œThis is a sativa dominant hybrid. It's excellent.â€
â€œI had vaped some of this August. 292014. It was fantastic. Coved in try combs   Deep brillent green pungent skunk that was so freakn mellow.â€

â€œIt makes everything in your body super heavy; your eyelids, legs, arms, front part of your head. It sort of gives you an LSD feeling if you're active. You will have the best night's sleep with this.â€

â€œStoney but still quite stimulating. Great for activities such as video games, puzzles, board games, or a nice bike ride. Probably not my choice for anything where you're stuck sitting still and not engaged, such as watching a movie or something, but this is my new go-to strain for any sort of activity.â€

â€œWonderful work night relief for a mellow chill. Smoked from a pipe, shared a small nug with a friend. Not too harsh, did not expect any high but did get a small head high quickly. Still able to function and get some things done easily. The touch of THC was nice and uplifting. Stress drifted away and felt a nice body buzz. Tingles and relaxed chat over a few beers. Had a good solid sleep 3 hours later. This oneâ€™s not ...â€
â€œsmoked a RAW joint.... zzzzzzzzzzzzzz.â€

â€œThis strain gives a great amount of mental stimulation with minimal physical punishment. It's not overwhelming, you can control it well if you're an experienced smoker. When you find yourself sober, you're not too far off how you felt originally while being high.â€
â€œVery nice cbd rich strain for total relaxation. Great stress reliever and mild painkiller. Best used at night for unwinding after a long day.â€
â€œI think its Awesome, I suffer from extreme neck pain an this does wonders for pain.â€
â€œgoodâ€
â€œThis strain is Firee!!! I was feeling so high that I had to come and check out the effects of this Strain!! Definitely a runner up for my favorite strain!!â€

â€œDecent pain releiver, but had a slight edginess to it. Despite being an indica, I found this to be more of a daytime strain. It's not bad, but I prefer some other high CBD strains I've reviewed over the Shark.â€
â€œWhy does it taste like laundry?â€
